name: Flowers & Feelings 001 - Brillar
description:
Brillar, es una obra inspirada en el rechazo a esas personas que intentan brillar queriendo opacar la luz de otros ✨

¡No dejes que apaguen tu luz!

Siempre van a existir personas a tu alrededor queriendo apagar tu luz para poder brillar ellos, van a reflejar sus inseguridades y a generar vibras negativas.

No dejes que las cargas de los demás afecten tu vida, enfócate en lo positivo y en tus virtudes. 

Valórate y valora todo lo que has logrado.

-

Shine, it is a work inspired by the rejection of those people who try to shine wanting to dull the light of others ✨

Don't let them turn off your light!

There will always be people around you wanting to turn off your light so that they can shine, they will reflect their insecurities and generate negative vibes.

Do not let the burdens of others affect your life, focus on the positive and your virtues.

Value yourself and value all that you have achieved.
